channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description:
I am trying to add the following to my item.cfg [code]item = 3680 Elysian Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3 item = 3681 Arcane Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 20 0 53 55 73 2 52 0 3 item = 3682 Divine Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3 item = 3683 Spectral Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 53 55 73 30 52 0 3 item = 3684 Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 39 41 50 1 45 0 1 item = 3685 Blessed Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 53 55 73 2 52 0 3[/code]
And I get the following message when I run my server.
[code]Expectation in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemmHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:127)[/code]
Please help me, it will be greatly appreciated :)

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Spirit_Shield
Any names using more than one word should be underscored not spaced.

Read full topic

item = 3680 Elysian Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3 item = 3681 Arcane Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 20 0 53 55 73 2 52 0 3 item = 3682 Divine Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3 item = 3683 Spectral Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 53 55 73 30 52 0 3 item = 3684 Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 39 41 50 1 45 0 1 item = 3685 Blessed Spirit Shield 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 0 0 0 0 0 53 55 73 2 52 0 3
